=================================
### Notice of Contract Cancellation

**Annulation du contrat**

#### Contract Information

**Date annulation du contrat** : Nulle

#### Procurement Information

#### Entity Information

#### Contact Information

### Important Note

Please be aware that the contract for the goods and services listed above has been cancelled. Defence Construction Canada may re-issue the contract or solicit new offers in the future. We recommend contacting Mark Smith, Procurement Official, Defence Construction Canada for further details.
